title: Room for discussion: group relations
brief_description: Examines the nature and function of discussion in both its personal aspects and also in its broader aspects. Intended to develop an understanding of the process of discussion and create an interest in participating in such activity. Explains that discussion brings information to the individual, leads to a broader and richer life and expedites cooperative achievement. Emphasises that discussion is the privilege and responsibility of all citizens living in a democracy.
